module_restrictions: Undergraduate exchange students cannot take classes in any business department (including Accounting, Administration, Economics, Entrepreneurship, Finance, Management, Management Information Systems, or Marketing). Some departments have specific restrictions as well.
visa_info: Students attending the university in another status (not J-1) must upload proof of status in the Immigration Documentation e-form. After receiving the I-20, students must pay the SEVIS I-901 fee and apply for a J-1 student visa (except for citizens of Canada and Bermuda).
accommodations_info: The University of Arizona has two offices on campus to assist students with housing options: Residence Life for on-campus housing and Off-Campus Housing for off-campus living options and resources. Housing is not guaranteed, but early applicants are usually provided with housing.
cost_of_living: Tuition is waived for exchange students. The estimated monthly living expenses can be found at https://financialaid.arizona.edu/freshmen/estimated-cost-attendance.
